content:
## Problem
Operators lose time wiring each agent stage manually.

## Audience
Senior engineers and PMs running iterative idea reviews.

## Platform
Next.js + Fastify single-origin web app.

## Core Flow
Answer chat prompts, edit docs, and approve each stage once validators pass.

## MVP Features
- Intake doc capture
- One-pager synthesis
- Spec drafting
- Prompt plan instructions
